alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:14AM EST until January 20 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Alleghany Highlands. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to midnight EST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The public is encouraged to report snowfall amounts or wind damage to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov...through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
